hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Job job where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(code) ||isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(remark)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(job.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(job.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(remark)> or lower(job.remark) = lower(:remark) </if> <if isNotBlank(departmentName)> or lower(job.departmentName) like '%${departmentName?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(dutyName)> or lower(job.dutyName) like '%${dutyName?lower_case}%' </if> ) </if> <if tenantId != cisTenantId> and tenantId = :tenantId </if> order by ${orderBy}
